comments.body: I liked the comment formatting better before -- newlines make it more readable.
See the other comments, I just made it consistent.
Great attention to detail @uiii thanks a lot for that!
I think all the properties are optional so they should be something like `unit?: ..., extend?: ...`
Good question. I'm not entirely sure, but you are _probably_ right. I'll go change it.
The build failed, with the log mentioning `codemirror-react`. I'm not actually sure where to find that again (I already pushed a revert commit).
Something weird is going on with CI not related to your changes. I think the change was fine. But we can merge it either way.
Will keep it like this for now – maybe my first PR in this project is not the best one to fight CI over a change I'm not sure about. Thanks for your help!
